title: Responsible pet ownership
creator_contributor_role: Department of Natural Resources and Environment, production company
subject_group: Animals & Wildlife/Domestic animals - Care and treatment
description: This video contains some practical tips and useful information on the following areas of dog and cat ownership: choosing a pet; taking care of your pet's health; general wellbeing; cat and dog registration; teaching children how to behave around dogs; knowing the signs of a frightened or threatening dog and more. Begins with five 30 second advertisements which were screened on national television in the year 2000 concerning responsible pet ownership and continues with two short videos on pet owners and their responsibilities to the animals.
